bands.name: AC/DC
bands.fun_fact: Malcolm Young and Angus developed the band's name after their sister saw the initials AC/DC on a sewing machine.

bands.name: Foo Fighters
bands.fun_fact: All instruments on the first Foo Fighters album were performed by David Grohl.

bands.name: Metallica
bands.fun_fact: Metallica set a Guinness World Record for becoming the first musical act to perform on every continent.

bands.name: Guns N' Roses
bands.fun_fact: 'Sweet Child Oâ€™ Mine', came about by chance. Slash had only strummed along a bit and Axl Rose wrote the lyrics within a day.

bands.name: Nirvana
bands.fun_fact: 'Smells Like Teen Spirit' was inspired by Kurt Cobain's girlfriend's deodorant. And alcohol.

bands.name: Pearl Jam
bands.fun_fact: Several of its songs were demos they used to recruit a singer.

bands.name: Black Sabbath
bands.fun_fact: During a live concert, Ozzy Osbourne inadvertently bit the head off a live bat, leading to rabies shots and countless headlines.

bands.name: Mother Love Bone
bands.fun_fact: They had invented a new sound that drew from classic hard rock, but incorporated some aspects of what came to be known as grunge.

bands.name: Soundgarden
bands.fun_fact: Soundgarden was the first grunge band to sign to a major label (A&M Records in 1989).

bands.name: Red Hot Chili Peppers
bands.fun_fact: In the early days, they appeared on stage naked (except for sports socks over their genitals)..
